text: Jill Halfpenny (born 15 July 1975) is an English actress. She is best known for portraying the roles of Rebecca Hopkins in the ITV soap opera Coronation Street (1999–2000), Kate Mitchell in the BBC soap opera EastEnders (2002–2005), Izzie Redpath in the BBC school-based drama series Waterloo Road (2006–2007), and Diane Manning in the BBC drama series In the Club (2014–2016). In 2004, she won the second series of the television dance contest Strictly Come Dancing. ==Other websites== * Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:English child actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:People from Tyne and Wear
title: Jill Halfpenny
